评论详情: I have to give this item 5 stars, as it is exactly as described and exactly what my daughter wanted. Baggy, big, high-waisted jeans. The quality is actually really good. They are high quality, well-made levi jeans with a cute design. Aaaannd they fit just as our tweens desire: tiny waist, belly button just visible, and 7" too long in the legs. They are fabulous and in-style. I feel too young to sound like  "In my day, skinny jeans were in style....why so baggy?" I suppose this is a cyclical problem. Better baggy and high-waisted than super toight, and refuse to come off! 'Tis the trend.

The fabric is on the thin side but not see through, the material is also of no stretch; great for Spring, Summer and Fall. The design is as pictured. The pants are high waisted and tailored for taller people in my opinion (atleast someone 5'8 or taller) Not short people like me. lol I read the other reviews and went with sizing up one size but unfortunately the large was too big (I am 5'4 and 130 pounds) A medium most likely would have been a better fit in the waist.
